snippet: A Harvard law professor testified that WikiLeaks performed a legitimate journalistic function when Pfc. Bradley Manning gave it vast archives of secret government files.
abstract: Defense in court-martial of Pfc Bradley Manning rests its case, with Harvard law professor Yochai Benkler testifying that WikiLeaks performed a legitimate journalistic function when Manning gave it vast archives of secret government files.
lead_paragraph: A Harvard law professor testified that WikiLeaks performed a legitimate journalistic function when Pfc. Bradley Manning gave it vast archives of secret government files.

headline.main: Soldier’s Lawyers Rest Case With a Defense of WikiLeaks’ Journalistic Role
headline.print_headline: Soldier’s Lawyers Rest Case With a Defense of WikiLeaks’ Journalistic Role

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
